Without explicit loop:

```{r}
# import libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
data_frame(
  z = c(0, sample(0:15, 2499, TRUE)),
  x = accumulate(z, ~.x + cos(pi / 8 * .y)),
  y = accumulate(z, ~.x + sin(pi / 8 * .y))
) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x, y)) +
    geom_polygon() +
    theme_void()
```
